title: The list of eligible tenants and the area occupied by each of them in BDD Chawls shall be certified by the Competent Authority appointed by Government for this purpose
clause_text: The list of eligible tenants and the area occupied by each of them in BDD Chawls shall be certified by the Competent Authority appointed by Government for this purpose.
section: Eligibility of Occupants for Rehabilitation under Urban Renewal Scheme (URS)
